name: UIFocusItemContainer
desc: The container responsible for providing geometric context to focus items within a given focus environment.

items.name: func focusItems(in: CGRect) -> [UIFocusItem]
items.desc: Retrieves all of the focus items within this container that intersect with the provided rectangle.

items.name: var coordinateSpace: UICoordinateSpace
items.desc: The coordinate space of the focus items contained in the focus item container.
